title: Where to Find a Cherry Grove Blossom Biome in Minecraft

steps.title: Cherry Grove Biomes are found in higher-elevation regions.
steps.content: Cherry Grove Biomes are found in higher-elevation regions. As with all other biomes in Minecraft , cherry grove biomes are generated at random. They are kind of rare, so finding one is mostly a matter of luck. [1] X Research source You can find cherry grove biomes alongside mountains and meadows. They have cherry trees with pink leaves that can be seen from a distance. Cherry grove biomes are found in Minecraft 1.20 or later. Be sure to update your Minecraft game and make sure that the world you are playing in was created in a more recent version of the game.

steps.title: Make sure you have cheats enabled.
steps.content: Make sure you have cheats enabled. You can only use chat commands if you have cheats enabled or if you are playing in Creative Mode . You can enable cheats or select Creative Mode when you start a new game, or by clicking the pencil icon next to a saved game to change the game settings.

steps.title: Open the chat.
steps.content: Open the chat. You can open the chat by pressing "T" on the PC version of the game, or by pressing "right" on the D-pad on game consoles.

steps.title: Type /locate biome cherry_grove.
steps.content: Type /locate biome cherry_grove . This will display the coordinates of the nearest cherry grove biome in "x y z" format.

steps.title: Type /tp [coordinates] to teleport to the nearest cherry grove biome.
steps.content: Type /tp [coordinates] to teleport to the nearest cherry grove biome. Coordinates should be entered in "x y z" format (i.e. /tp -1033 101 -1033 ). [2] X Research source

steps.title: Start a new game with a seed.
steps.content: Start a new game with a seed. Seeds are numeric codes that generate the worlds you play in. You can use seeds to create custom modes and start games in biomes you want. Use the following steps to start a game using a seed in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition: Click Play on the title screen. Click Create New . Click Create New World . Click Advanced in the menu bar to the left. Enter a seed number below "World Seed." Click Create .

steps.title: Cherry grove biome seeds.
steps.content: Cherry grove biome seeds. The following are some world seeds that will spawn you in a cherry grove biome: [3] X Research source Cherry grove biome around a mountain: 432587 Riverside cherry grove biome: 338861 Cherry grove surrounded by snow: 81498 Cherry grove biome in a crater: 4424490 Large cherry grove biome: 275492403 Cherry grove biome next to savanna: 284022503 Massive cherry grove biome island: 89138089
